name: Platform Puzzle Mechanic for Buildbox BBDOC
name_original: Platform Puzzle Mechanic for Buildbox BBDOC
description:
This listing includes a BBDOC (BB v3.4.6)

This puzzle platform prototype demonstrates an unusual visual concept where the platforms are made of negative space. This mechanic allows the player to jump through the "platform" from underneath and land on top. Also includes a small mechanic in the main character "Cubie" that allows his eyes to look in the direction that he is running.

Made with Buildbox 3.4.6 in a 3D world.

Controls are Left Arrow, Right Arrow, and Space for jump
